pullRequest.title: Append interceptors to elasticsearch-6.x-plugin
pullRequest.bodyText:
If this is non-trivial feature, paste the links/URLs to the design doc.
 Update the documentation to include this new feature.
 Tests(including UT, IT, E2E) are added to verify the new feature.
 If it's UI related, attach the screenshots below.

Before appending, Analyze, searchScroll, clearScroll, searchTemplate and deleteByQuery will be tracked through HTTP. In order to show uniformity, our company has modified the jar package separately to replace it, but it is too troublesome. In order to facilitate more people to use, so submit this pr.

 If this pull request closes/resolves/fixes an existing issue, replace the issue number. Closes #.
 Update the CHANGES log.

commit.message: Modify the format of the import package

nodes.bodyText: UnnecessaryParentheses:  Unnecessary use of grouping parentheses
UnnecessaryParentheses:  Unnecessary use of grouping parentheses

remove the unnecessary use of grouping parentheses
